headline: Best Quant-rated small- and mid-cap healthcare stocks as LLY hits $1T in market cap
synthesis: This ties into broader market movement and sentiment.

timeline.text: The headline highlights a significant milestone for Eli Lilly, suggesting increased investor confidence in the healthcare sector. This trend reflects both market dynamics and evolving investor strategies.
